description: ff. 260. 255 x 170; 195 x 120 mm. 25 lin. 15th cen. Commentary on al-Bukhārīʼs collection: Brockelmann, GAL, I, 164 (commentary 6); S I, 262. Incip.: ... الحمد لله على ما عم بالانعام وخص بالبىان والافهام ... اما بعد فانى قصدت فى هذا الاملاء الى اىضاح ... لفظ غرىب او اعراب غامض
author: Zarkashī, Muḥammad ibn Bahādur, 1344 or 5-1392
title: al-Tanqīḥ li-alfāẓ al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ.
creator: Zarkashī, Muḥammad ibn Bahādur, 1344 or 5-1392
subject: Bukhārī, Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl, 810-870—Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
